process.description: Verify File Upload in a Loop Control
process.name: TCP4-2269 Verify File Upload in a Loop Control
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="55" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_5</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_3" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_5" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="250" y="200" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="340" y="180" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="500" y="200" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <di:waypoint x="268" y="218"/>
        <di:waypoint x="398" y="218"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="398" y="218"/>
        <di:waypoint x="518" y="218"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.name: Variable Name

config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.label: File Accepted
config.helper: application/msword, image/gif, image/jpeg, application/pdf, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/vnd.ms-excel, text/plain

config.label: Required
config.helper: Prevent form from being submitted unless a file is uploaded
